properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:56AM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida...

Shoal River near Mossy Head (CR 1087) affecting Walton County

The Flood Warning continues for
the Shoal River near Mossy Head (CR 1087).
* From this morning, or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:30 AM Thursday the stage was 14.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast: The river will continue rising to near 15.9 feet by
Friday morning.
* Impact: At 16.0 feet: The Hinote Road Bridge begins to flood. The
road is subject to closure.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interest along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts, and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property. Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you
see flood waters: Turn around. Don't drown.

For graphical hydrologic information, please go to weather.gov and
click on your state. Select Rivers and Lakes AHPS under current
conditions and click on your river point.
